block.p: Mr. and Mrs. Robert A. Lerman of West Hartford, Conn., have announced June wedding plans for their daughter Beth Stacey Lerman and Neil George Becker, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Leo Becker, also of West Hartford. Both are associates in Hartford law firms, Miss Lerman at Green & Kleinman and Mr. Becker at Berman & Sable. Miss Lerman, 28 years old, graduated from Connecticut College and received a J.D. degree from American University. Mr. Becker, 27, graduated cum laude from Duke University and received a J.D. degree from Emory University.
